item.title: TPL
item.description: Django Third Party Library. https://github.com/rosarior/awesome-django Add this application to your django project in settings.py. INSTALLED_APPS = ( 'south', 'debug_toolbar', 'crispy_forms', ... ) django-rest-framework django的RESTful API的application。 https://github.com/tomchristie/django-rest-framework/tree/master https://github.com/django-json-api/django-rest-framework-json-api https://github.com/SimpleJWT/django-rest-framework-simplejwt admin interface https://github.com/geex-arts/django-jet https://github.com/sehmaschine/django-grappelli https://github.com/darklow/django-suit https://github.com/sshwsfc/xadmin authentication https://github.com/etianen/django-python3-ldap https://github.com/pennersr/django-allauth/ https://github.com/django-guardian/django-guardian database https://github.com/django-dbbackup/django-dbbackup debug https://github.com/jazzband/django-debug-toolbar
